product.title: Anime Demon Slayer Kamado Tanjirou Training Fox Mask Nano Building Blocks
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Bring your favourite Anime to life!

    Before Tanjiro became a Demon Slayer, he was a coal burner before his entire family was slaughtered by Muzan while his younger sister, Nezuko, was turned into a demon. He now takes on a path to become a Demon Slayer and turn Nezuko back into a human as well as taking down Muzan. 

    He wears a blue, cloud-patterned samue-styled kimono and black pants, nearly identical to Sakonji's outfit whilst he prepares for his Demon Slayer exam. Build your favorite character and have him protect your room from evil spirits and demons.

    🌊  Measurements: 8 x 8 x 18cm
    🌊  Not compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm) 
    🌊  This is made out of Nano blocks (8mm)
    🌊  Over 1110 nano pieces
    🌊  Excludes the original box to protect the environment, see below for details
     

    Take this opportunity to build your favorite Demon Slayer characters to take on your own Demons! Choose between a variety of characters to destroy all the Demons in this world.


    📦 Please note: All building sets do not come with the original box to protect the environment but they do come in separate bags. For further details please see below.* Save our planet from unnecessary waste.

    The perfect gift for those who love ANIME!

    These Demon Slayer building blocks are a great gift for any Anime fans! These will definitely be a memorable gift for anybody who loves Demon Slayer.

    Nano Blocks: Smaller than the micro and traditional building block.



    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet, and reduce postage costs on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow. 

    Features

    🌊 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    🌊 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    🌊 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    🌊 High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contains small parts; not suitable for children under 8 years old unless there is adult supervision.


  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
